name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and fresh basil.

name: Pasta Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta with Alfredo sauce and Parmesan cheese.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Grilled chicken pieces cooked in a spiced creamy tomato curry.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assorted sushi rolls with soy sauce and pickled ginger.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Grilled vegetable patty served in a bun with lettuce, tomato, and sauce.

name: Pad Thai
description: Traditional Thai stir-fried noodles with shrimp, peanuts, and lime.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Mexican-style pork tacos served with pineapple and cilantro.

name: Ramen Bowl
description: Japanese noodle soup with pork, boiled egg, and vegetables.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, and tomato on a bun.

name: Buffalo Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Soft paneer cubes cooked in a rich and creamy tomato gravy.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Golden-fried fish served with crispy fries and tartar sauce.

name: Greek Salad
description: Fresh salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Classic pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices and mozzarella.
